snippet.title: Does a male have to have a circumcision
snippet.description: There is no reason why a male should be circumcised, MGM of this sort is a religious rite

snippet.title: What is the morbidity factor with male circumcision
snippet.description: Severe penile injuries are rare and include penile amputation (partial or total), laceration, hemorrhage, and damage to the urinary tract. Meningitis, penile necrosis, necrotizing faciitis, and sepsis

snippet.title: When is circumcision performed on a male
snippet.description: circumcision for medical reasons is relatively rare and may take place at any time.

snippet.title: What happens during male circumcision
snippet.description: Circumcision requires anesthesia, either local or general. The foreskin is then cut off

snippet.title: What is the process of male circumcision
snippet.description: Circumcision is the surgical removal or amputation of the prepuce or foreskin from over the head

snippet.title: Can a male and female have intercourse if the male without circumcision
Is Circumcision necessary for the male
What are the names of the male circumcision cuts
snippet.description: Low and loose as well as high and tight.

snippet.title: How is male circumcision performed
snippet.description: They normally knock you out or numb your penis then simply pull the foreskin back and chop it off with a pair of dental scissors. Nothing to worry about
